Photos.Controller

Class PhotoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Photos.Controller.Controller
      • Photos.Controller.PhotoController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchController

    public class PhotoController
extends Controller
    Handles the photo view that shows when opening an album. Displays photos in a list on the left, and a slideshow of the photos on the right. Users can edit the photo details on the right.
    Author:
    Krysti Leong, April Dizon
